类 Enemy

com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature.Creature
com.ae2dms.BubbleBobble.Unit.UpdatableUnit.Creature.Enemy
所有已实现的接口:
Alive, Updatable
直接已知子类:
Boss
public class Enemy extends Creature
A Enemy is a non-controllable GameObject that kills the Hero whenever it or its projectile comes in contact.

Enemies are able to be bubbled and free themselves from these bubbles after a period of time. Enemies change direction at random intervals, when hitting a wall, and when hitting the Hero's shield. Enemies jump at random intervals as well.

另请参阅:
EnemyCollide

    • Enemy

      public Enemy​(InteractableWorld world, int colNum, int rowNum)
      The constructor to initialize the Enemy
      参数:
      world - indicates where to add the object
      colNum - indicates the unit horizontal coordination
      rowNum - indicates the unit vertical coordination
